org.apache.catalina.users
Class MemoryGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.users.AbstractGroup
      org.apache.catalina.users.MemoryGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Group, java.security.Principal
public class MemoryGroup
extends AbstractGroup

Concrete implementation of Group for the MemoryUserDatabase implementation of UserDatabase.

Since:
4.1
Version:
$Revision: 466595 $ $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
